PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-08262013-06-18NRCAN,  CNSC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
SubjectAdministrative Monetary Penalties Regulations (Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission)
PrecisADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS (CANADIAN NUCLEAR SAFETY COMMISSION) in order to set out the list of violations that will be subject to Administrative Monetary Penalties under the Nuclear Safety and Control Act, the method and criteria by which the penalty amounts will be determined, and the manner in which notices of violations must be served for legal purposes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0139 Publication Date: 2013-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
